ygData.subject: Famine arrives at the base
ygData.msgSnippet: Famine arrived at the base.  He had to hurry. He first opened a comm to Sphink with the instructions to come back to the ark with some tools and supplies. Then

Subject:  Famine arrives at the base
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103

 Famine arrived at the base.  He had to hurry. He first opened a comm to 
Sphink with the instructions to come back to the ark with some tools and 
supplies. Then he made another comm to Kit Kat. "My leader the situation at 
the ark has calmed down. They wish us to lend some tools or supplies that we 
can spare. Destructor told me of a room which holds such things. Do I have 
your permission to proceed?"
